name: Plutonium
educationalNotes: Plutonium is notorious - triggers nuclear chain reactions in bombs! Plutonium-239 fissile - basis of atomic bombs and nuclear reactors. Produced in nuclear reactor neutron capture. Extremely radiotoxic - microgram lethal if inhaled. Named after Pluto (mythical underworld). Discovered in 1940. Plutonium-238 powers deep-space probes (radioisotope thermoelectric generators). Half-life 24,000 years - contamination hazard for millennia.
